audioContentItems.fileTranscript: Thank you for calling Carnival, my name is [Agent Name]. May I have your name and booking number, please?
Hi. My name is Mary, and my booking number is G H 6 0 J 8.
Great, Thank you. I will pull that up for you.
Thank you for that.
Yes.
I see your email address is marytest@email.com, and your mobile number is 555 987-1234. You are currently not signed up for text alerts, would you like it to stay that way?
Yes, I do not want text alerts.
And Mary, did you want to purchase the Carnival Vacation Protection today?
No, thank you.
Ok, Mary. How can I help you today?
I wanted to purchase the transfers.
No problem, Mary let me check a few things for you.
Ok.
Thank you for your patience, Mary. Do you know what airport you’re flying into?
Yes, the Miami International Airport.

Ok, great. If you fly into Miami it will be $22.99 one way, or $45.98 round trip, and I do have to tell you the recommended flight time for the pre cruise transfer is no later than 12PM, and the earliest flight for debarkation is no earlier than 12PM. Did you want to purchase for both guests?
Yes .
Great, I will go ahead and add it for both guests.
Yes, please add them.
Thank you, I’ve added the transfers for both guests. Do you have any other questions today, Mary?
Yes, I have one more question, can you tell me about the ‘Behind the Fun’ tour ?
I’d be more than happy to tell you about that, Mary. One moment while I pull up the information.

Since you'll be sailing on the Carnival Horizon, the tour starts at $130. It runs about 3 to 3¾ hours and gives you an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the ship. You’ll get to see the bridge, the engine control room, the main galley, staff dining areas, storerooms, the laundry, and more. It’s a rare chance to explore parts of the ship most guests never get to see.
Awesome I will go on Carnival.com and book that.
That's great, each tour is limited to 16 people so booking in advance is recommended.
No, that is all I had for you today.
It’s been my pleasure to assist you, Mary. Would you mind if I sent you a survey about my service today?
Yes, you can do that.
Thank you for calling Carnival, Have a great day!
May I have your pin number please?
Mary, may I confirm these changes?

Ok, Mary, you now have the option to book the ‘Behind the Fun’ tour before your cruise. It includes a limited edition ‘Behind the Fun’ baseball cap that marks you as an honorary team member, complimentary commemorative photos, some Carnival-branded goodies, and light snacks and pastries.
I see that you and John are sailing on Carnival Horizon, December 6th, 2025, is that correct?
Mary, do you have any other questions for me today?

settings.text: This simulation will give you practice in handling a beginner call type. You can go through this as many times as desired until you feel confident in the navigation and call flow. Have your audio and microphone ready. You must complete the test version to receive credit for completion of this simulation. Let's get started.
Click on the Carnival logo menu button.
Type in 'Mary' and then press your 'Enter' key.
Type in 'GH60J8' and then press your 'Enter' key.
Verify the 'Email', 'Mobile Number' and 'Text Alert Type'.
Verify the Carnival Vacation Protection status.
Click on the sailing location to view the itinerary.
The itinerary shows the location they are sailing out of.
Switch windows to 'iKnow'. Click on the 'Chrome' icon.
Type in 'Transfers from Miami', then press your 'Enter' key.
Click on the link for 'Cruises from Miami'.
Here you can see the price for transfers.
Go back to the booking. Click on the 'Carnival' icon.
Click on the 'Inbound Airport' drop down arrow for the first passenger.
Click on the 'Inbound Airport' drop down arrow for the second passenger.
Click on the 'Outbound Airport' drop down arrow for the first passenger.
Click on the 'Outbound Airport' drop down arrow for the second passenger.
Switch windows to 'iKnow'. Click on the 'Chrome' icon.
Type in 'Behind the fun tour', then press your 'Enter' key.
Return to Carnival Navigator. Click the Carnival icon.
Click on the arrow for 'Add Comments'.
Now you can add your comment.
Type in 'Added transfers and advised of Behind the Fun tour', then press your 'Enter' key.

settings.expectedValue: Added transfers and advised of Behind the Fun tour

settings.text: Click on the 'Survey Email' drop down.
Close the booking to save it. Click the 'X'.
Congratulations! You have completed this simulation.
